problem.markdown:
>>The T wave is produced during<< ( ) repolarisation of the ventricles ( ) atrial repolarisation ( ) depolarisation of the ventricles ( ) atrial depolarization
>>Artifacts are<< ( ) radio noises ( ) skin crafts ( ) time varying half cell potentials ( ) radio capsules
>>In ECG, the calibration signal amplitude is<< ( ) 1 V ( ) 1 µV ( ) 1 mV ( ) 0.5 mV
>>In the case of stable total AV block, a pacemaker is chosen<< ( ) with constant frequency ( ) that is atrial synchronous ( ) that is ventricular synchronous ( ) with variable frequency and synchronization with ventricular action
>>The magnitude of the polarization for a given electrode material is dependent primarily on the<< ( ) shape of electrode ( ) current density at the surface of contact between electrode and tissue ( ) impedance of the electrode ( ) Half cell potential
